keyMoments.title: Receives Alliance Proposal from Law
keyMoments.description: Law proposes a pirate alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates to take down one of the Four Emperors.
keyMoments.significance: This alliance proposal sets the Straw Hats on a path that will lead them to take down Doflamingo and eventually Kaido.

keyMoments.title: Law Proposes Alliance with Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Law, representing the Heart Pirates, proposes an alliance with the Straw Hat Pirates to challenge the Four Emperors.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the Heart Pirates' formal alliance with the Straw Hats that spans multiple arcs.

keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines Battle Caesar's Forces
keyMoments.description: The G-5 Marines engage in combat with Caesar's centaur and satyr subordinates on Punk Hazard.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the Marines' involvement in the Punk Hazard conflict and their opposition to Caesar's illegal operations.

keyMoments.title: Smoker and Tashigi Reinforce G-5
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Smoker and Captain Tashigi arrive to support the G-5 Marines in their battle.
keyMoments.significance: Turns the tide in favor of the Marines and demonstrates their leadership.
